title: Humanism's influence on role of individual

content.question: Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes.Explain the ways in which Italian Renaissance humanism transformed ideas about the individual’s role in society.

frqParts.text: Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes.Explain the ways in which Italian Renaissance humanism transformed ideas about the individual’s role in society.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
